name: @neoskop/hrbac
description: An implementation of a hierarchical role based access control for nodejs and browser.

scripts.test:coverage: rimraf coverage && nyc -e '.ts' -r html -r text mocha -r ts-node/register 'src/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.test: npm run test:coverage && nyc report -r text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist bundle esm5 esm2015
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:index && npm run build:ng
scripts.build:index: ngc -p tsconfig.index.esm5.json && ngc -p tsconfig.index.esm2015.json && rollup -c rollup.index.js
scripts.build:ng: ngc -p tsconfig.ng.esm5.json && ngc -p tsconfig.ng.esm2015.json && rollup -c rollup.ng.js
scripts._build: npm run clean && npm run build:ngc && npm run build:rollup:index && npm run build:rollup:ng
scripts._build:ngc: ngc -p tsconfig.ng.esm5.json && ngc -p tsconfig.index.esm5.json && ngc -p tsconfig.ng.esm2015.json && ngc -p tsconfig.index.esm2015.json
scripts.postinstall: rm -f node_modules/@neoskop/hrbac && mkdir -p node_modules/@neoskop && ln -s ../.. node_modules/@neoskop/hrbac

author: Mark Wecke <mark.wecke@gmail.com>
